summary: The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and updates to frontend file summaries and project state, but does not provide concrete evidence of investigation or fixes for the site loading issue. The BuildRequest requires identifying the root cause through browser console inspection, fixing critical errors, verifying routes, and ensuring backend/auth initializationâ€”none of which are documented in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Investigate why the website fails to load and identify the root cause of the loading error (browser console errors, network failures, JavaScript exceptions, routing issues, or backend connection problems)
missing_requirements.reason: No documentation, investigation notes, console error logs, or root cause analysis provided in the diff. The acceptance criteria require identifying and documenting the specific point of failure through browser console inspection, but no such evidence exists.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix all critical errors preventing the website from loading successfully so that the homepage displays correctly when users access the application URL
missing_requirements.reason: No specific fixes to critical loading errors are documented. While backend/main.mo was modified, there is no clear evidence these changes address homepage loading failures, console errors, or asset loading issues.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that all application routes load correctly without errors after fixing the initial loading issue
missing_requirements.reason: No testing results, verification logs, or evidence that routes were tested and confirmed working. The router.tsx is mentioned in summaries but not modified, and no route verification is documented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure backend actor initialization and Internet Identity authentication work correctly so that authenticated features function properly after the site loads
missing_requirements.reason: While backend/main.mo was modified, there is no documentation or testing evidence showing that actor initialization, Internet Identity authentication, or React Query data fetching were verified to work correctly.
